response.original_title: Long Distance Calling: Live at Lichtburg
response.overview: In February 2024, Long Distance Calling celebrated a career-defining moment: their biggest show to date at the historic Lichtburg cinema in Essen, Germany, in front of more than 1,200 fans. Surrounded by the majestic atmosphere of the venue, the band expanded their trademark instrumental rock sound with a stunning arrangement of strings and brass. Revisiting key moments of their catalogue, and especially reimagining tracks from Eraser and the seminal Avoid The Light, Long Distance Calling created a one- of-a-kind performance that bridges the past and the present of their musical journey.
response.title: Long Distance Calling: Live at Lichtburg

results.name: Long Distance Calling - Out There (Live at Lichtburg) | New Album 'Live at Lichtburg' Out Dec 5th
